about: International Freight Forwarding, Customs Brokerage & Glogal Logistics Services
company_overview:
Since 1965, our success in the fields of international freight forwarding and customs brokerage has been achieved by providing professional services, coupled with an intimate understanding of our clients' requirements. The success of our clients, associates and suppliers is interdependent.
By maintaining lasting and productive business relationships, we ensure our mutual well-being. Our clients expect timely and cost-effective services; our associates and suppliers seek maximum exposure for their products. Our shareholders look for a return on their investment; our employees desire fulfillment in their work. Meeting these needs requires continual effort and dedication.
We believe that by constantly striving for superior standards, we best serve this ideal.
general_info: Nous avons une vision claire de ce que l'avenir réserve à notre organisation. Je suis suis un P.D.G. très fier. Nos employés, associés et partenaires sont tout simplement fabuleux. Merci à vous tous pour tout le travail et le dévouement que vous apportez.
products:
International Freight Forwarding
US & Canadian Customs Brokerage
Logistics Services
name: Delmar International Inc
